item.title: 中国顶级锂业公司向墨西哥提出国际索赔
item.description: 在拉美国家取消了一个价值超过 10 亿美元的潜在采矿项目后，赣锋锂业已对墨西哥提起国际仲裁。【原文：Ganfeng Lithium has filed an international arbitration case against Mexico after the Latin American nation canceled a potential mining project valued at more than $1 billion.】

item.title: 帕拉丁公司的铀矿交易预示着 M&A 公司对加拿大丰富矿藏的争夺
item.description: 帕拉丁能源有限公司（Paladin Energy Ltd. ）以 11.4 亿加元（8.33 亿美元）的价格收购加拿大矿业公司裂变铀矿公司（Fission Uranium Corp.【原文：Paladin Energy Ltd.’s C$1.14 billion ($833 million) offer to buy Canadian mining firm Fission Uranium Corp. is all about geography.】

item.title: 美国赤字增加为发行更多国库券铺平道路
item.description: 美国财政赤字预计将在未来十年内增长，这可能会促使政府越来越依赖国库券和健康的需求来填补赤字。【原文：US fiscal deficits are projected to grow over the next decade, likely pushing the government to increasingly rely on Treasury bills and healthy demand to plug the holes.】

item.title: 欧洲央行施纳贝尔淡化与美国政策背离的前景
item.description: 欧洲中央银行执行董事会成员伊莎贝尔-施纳贝尔（Isabel Schnabel）淡化了欧元区利率走势与美国利率走势大相径庭的可能性。【原文：European Central Bank Executive Board member Isabel Schnabel downplayed the likelihood that interest rates in the euro zone will take a significantly different path from those in the US.】

item.title: 美国批准房地美购买二次抵押贷款试点计划
item.description: 美国监管机构已授权住房巨头房地美公司（Freddie Mac）实施一项购买二次抵押贷款的试点计划，这一转变最终将使家庭以房屋净值抵押借款的成本更低。【原文：US regulators have authorized a pilot program for housing giant Freddie Mac to buy second mortgages, a shift that could ultimately make it cheaper for households to borrow against the equity in their homes.】

item.title: 阿尔凯戈斯交易员倒闭数月后在圣特罗佩打马球
item.description: 在 Archegos Capital Management 于 2021 年 3 月倒闭后的那个夏天，前首席交易员威廉-富田（William Tomita）前往法国圣特罗佩，在那里打马球并与朋友聚会。【原文：The summer after Archegos Capital Management’s March 2021 collapse, former head trader William Tomita headed to St. Tropez, France, where he played polo and partied with friends.】

item.title: 前特拉菲古拉金属公司（Trafigura Metals）老板将领导竞争对手摩科瑞公司的 40 人新团队
item.description: 特拉菲古拉集团（Trafigura Group）金属业务前联席主管科斯塔斯-宾塔斯（Kostas Bintas）将与他的几位前同事一起加入摩科瑞能源集团有限公司（Mercuria Energy Group Ltd.），在该行业多年来最大的一次调整中带头积极进军金属业务。【原文：Trafigura Group’s former co-head of metals Kostas Bintas is joining Mercuria Energy Group Ltd. together with several of his ex-colleagues, to spearhead an aggressive push into metals in one of the industry’s biggest shakeups in years.】

item.title: 曾经欣欣向荣的加纳如何被迫寻求救助
item.description: 2010 年底，加纳加入了石油和天然气出口国的行列，这使这个西非国家成为非洲大陆最重要的投资目的地之一。不幸的是，这也促使历届政府大肆举债。2022 年，对国家偿付能力的怀疑演变成全面恐慌，投资者抛售加纳的债券和货币，政府被迫暂停支付外债利息。现在，加纳政府希望在以下情况之后翻开新的一页【原文：When Ghana joined the ranks of oil and gas exporting nations in late 2010, it helped turn the West African country into one of the continent’s top investment destinations. Unfortunately, it also prompted successive governments to borrow to the hilt. In 2022, doubts over the country’s solvency turned into full-blown panic, investors dumped Ghana’s bonds and currency, and the government was forced to suspend interest payments on its external debt. Now the government hopes to turn a new page after】

item.title: 巴斯夫将退出价值 26 亿美元的印度尼西亚镍冶炼厂项目
item.description: 巴斯夫公司（BASF SE）计划终止与埃拉美特公司（Eramet SA）合作在印尼建造一座镍钴精炼厂、耗资高达 26 亿美元的项目，从而推翻在这个东南亚国家旨在满足电动汽车需求的专项投资计划。【原文：BASF SE plans to discontinue a project with Eramet SA to spend as much as $2.6 billion building a nickel-cobalt refinery in Indonesia, reversing an earmarked investment in the Southeast Asian nation that was aimed at feeding demand for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 礼来减肥药数据引发睡眠呼吸暂停类股大跌
item.description: 这一类新型减肥药正被当作治疗膝关节置换术、肝病等一切疾病的灵丹妙药进行试验，并使股市的各个角落陷入混乱。【原文：The new class of weight-loss drugs are being tested as cure-alls for everything from knee replacements to liver disease and throwing corners of the stock market into disarray.】

item.title: 国防部长称丹麦将在年底结束对乌克兰的 F-16 飞行员培训
item.description: 北欧国家国防部长表示，丹麦将在今年年底结束对乌克兰 F-16 战机飞行员的培训项目，将重点放在新型战斗机上。【原文：Denmark will end its training program for Ukrainian pilots of F-16 warplanes at the end of the year to focus on its new fighter jets, the Nordic country’s defense minister said.】

item.title: 勒庞财政部长称不要将我们与利兹-特拉斯相提并论
item.description: 不要再把法国的国民拉力赛政府与英国利兹-特拉斯的短命政府相提并论了。【原文：Stop comparing a National Rally government in France to Liz Truss’s short-lived administration in the UK.】

item.title: 波音供应商莱昂纳多检修 787 现场，因为模型工作放缓
item.description: 莱昂纳多公司（Leonardo SpA）表示，由于波音公司的787梦想飞机项目产量放缓，该公司正在重新分配意大利一家工厂的工作，增加倾转旋翼机的产量。【原文：Leonardo SpA said it’s redistributing work at one of its Italian facilities by adding production of its tilt-rotor aircraft as output slows for Boeing Co.’s 787 Dreamliner program.】

item.title: Enbridge 与原住民合作开发萨斯喀彻温风电项目
item.description: 加拿大能源公司 Enbridge Inc. 正与六个原住民团体合作，在萨斯喀彻温省东南部开发一个风力发电场，该发电场可为 10 万户家庭提供足够的电力。【原文：Enbridge Inc., a Canadian energy company, is working with six indigenous groups to develop a wind farm in southeast Saskatchewan that can deliver enough power for 100,000 homes.】

item.title: 低迷抹去 4000 亿美元，英伟达进入修正区
item.description: 英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp. ）股价周一下跌，这家专注于人工智能的芯片制造商进入了调整区间，延续了近期的大幅下挫。【原文：Nvidia Corp. shares fell on Monday, with the AI-focused chipmaker entering correction territory as it extends a sharp recent selloff.】

item.title: 欧盟制裁 27 艘被指帮助俄罗斯战争机器的船只
item.description: 欧盟对二十多艘船只实施了制裁，其中包括 17 艘为莫斯科运输石油的船只。【原文：The European Union placed sanctions on more than two dozen vessels, including 17 that hauled oil for Moscow.】

item.title: 阿姆鲁批评美国 "单方面 "冻结牛油果运输
item.description: 墨西哥总统安德烈斯-曼努埃尔-洛佩斯-奥夫拉多尔（Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador）批评美国单方面采取行动冻结从墨西哥运出的部分牛油果，但表示这一问题可以在周一得到解决。【原文：Mexico President Andres Manuel Lopez Obrador criticized the US for acting unilaterally to freeze some avocado shipments from the country but said the issue could be resolved Monday.】

item.title: 即使欧盟 "绿色协议 "的支持力度减弱，道达尔仍坚持可再生能源计划
item.description: 即使欧洲大选结果显示，由于担心能源成本，选民对集团绿色政策的支持率正在下降，道达尔能源 SE 公司仍将坚持其发展可再生能源发电的计划。【原文：TotalEnergies SE will stick to its plan to grow in renewable power even after the results of European elections suggested that voters’ support for the bloc’s green policies was waning due to concerns over energy costs.】

item.title: Jump Crypto 总裁卡纳夫-卡里亚（Kanav Kariya）宣布卸任
item.description: 跳转交易公司加密货币部门负责人卡纳夫-卡里亚（Kanav Kariya）表示，他将离开公司，在此之前的两年里，卡里亚和跳转公司都处于加密货币最大崩溃事件的中心。【原文：Kanav Kariya, the head of Jump Trading’s crypto unit, said he is leaving the company, a departure that follows a difficult two years that saw both Kariya and Jump at the center of one of crypto’s largest collapses.】

item.title: 比特币基金两周内流出量创 ETF 批准以来之最
item.description: 比特币投资产品连续两周流出约 6 亿美元，这是自美国 1 月份批准交易所交易基金持有这种最大的加密货币以来两周内流出最多的一次。【原文：Bitcoin investment products saw around $600 million in outflows for a second consecutive week, the most over a two-week period since the US approved exchange-traded funds to hold the largest cryptocurrency in January.】

item.title: BMC 软件公司启动 66 亿美元贷款再融资计划
item.description: 以高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）为首的银行推出了今年最大的杠杆贷款交易之一，为 BMC 软件公司即将到期的贷款进行再融资。【原文：Banks led by Goldman Sachs Group Inc. have launched one of the largest leveraged loan deals this year to refinance BMC Software’s upcoming maturities.】

item.title: 前瓦尔堡银行家因健康状况不佳结束逃税审判
item.description: M.M. Warburg & Co.公司前负责人在Cum-Ex税务交易中的作用导致德国损失了2.8亿欧元（3.01亿美元），对他的审判因其健康状况不佳而在没有判决的情况下结束。【原文：The trial against the former head of M.M. Warburg & Co. over his role in Cum-Ex tax deals that cost Germany €280 million ($301 million) was ended without a verdict because of his poor health.】

item.title: 凯雷、高盛向 Apex 集团提供 11 亿美元 PIK 贷款
item.description: 据 Carlyle Group Inc. 和高盛私人信贷公司（Goldman Sachs Private Credit）发表的一份声明称，该公司已向基金管理人 Apex Group 借出 11 亿美元的实物支付票据。【原文：Carlyle Group Inc. and Goldman Sachs Private Credit have lent a $1.1 billion payment-in-kind note to fund administrator Apex Group, according to a statement from the firm.】

item.title: 胡塞武装对商业航运的袭击愈演愈烈、愈发致命
item.description: 胡塞武装分子正在也门近海袭击商船，他们的袭击越来越有效，有时甚至是致命的，这暴露了以美国为首的联盟在世界上一些最重要的水道上平息暴力的局限性。【原文：Houthi militants are attacking commercial ships off Yemen with increasing — and sometimes deadly — effectiveness, exposing the limits of a US-led coalition to quell the violence in some of the world’s most important waterways.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称，尽管大选大跌，法国银行依然稳健
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，尽管埃马纽埃尔-马克龙（Emmanuel Macron）总统要求举行临时大选引发了投资者抛售，但法国银行仍然保持稳健。【原文：French banks remain solid — despite the investor selloff triggered when President Emmanuel Macron called snap elections — according to central-bank chief Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 斯里兰卡将于本周启动下一轮投资者会谈
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，斯里兰卡官员和全球投资者预计将于本周举行第二轮直接会谈，就 120 亿美元违约债券的重组问题达成一致。【原文：Sri Lankan officials and global investors are expected to hold a second round of direct talks this week to agree on the restructuring of $12 billion in defaulted bonds, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 随着政治风向的转变，加拿大央行将解释其大流行病行动
item.description: 加拿大央行正在对其大流行病时期的政策进行正式审查，当时央行购买了数千亿政府债券以压低利率。这可能是加拿大央行行长蒂夫-麦克尔姆（Tiff Macklem）在他最激烈的批评者之一上台之前解释自己的最后机会。【原文：The Bank of Canada is doing a formal review of its pandemic-era policies, when it bought hundreds of billions in government bonds to suppress interest rates. It may represent a last chance for Governor Tiff Macklem to explain himself before one of his fiercest critics comes to power.】

item.title: 墨西哥 6 月初通胀加速超过预期
item.description: 墨西哥 6 月初的通胀加速超过预期，进一步高于央行的目标，这可能会巩固墨西哥银行在周四利率会议上连续第二次暂停的决定。【原文：Mexico’s inflation accelerated more than expected in early June to move further above the central bank’s target, likely cementing a second straight pause by Banco de Mexico at its Thursday rate meeting.】
